Jan 27 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:: *INCREASE IN NAV PER SHARE TO 1,235 PENCE (30 SEPTEMBER 2021:1,153 PENCE) *TOTAL RETURN OF 32.6% FOR NINE MONTHS TO 31 DECEMBER 2021 *RECOGNISED A £201 MILLION LOSS ON FOREIGN EXCHANGE, NET OF HEDGING, IN QUARTER *3I IS WELL SET FOR A STRONG CLOSE TO OUR FINANCIAL YEAR END IN MARCH


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 27-JAN-202206:59:48.87 GMT
